# UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle

**Enumeration**

Settings that determine the appearance of the background corner radius.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CornerStyle
```

## Overview

Use this property to control how the button uses the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBackgroundConfiguration-swift.struct/cornerRadius] property of the button’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/Configuration-swift.struct/background].

## Corner styles

- **UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle.dynamic**: A style that adjusts the background corner radius for dynamic type.
- **UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle.fixed**: A style that uses the background corner radius without modification.
- **UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle.capsule**: A style that ignores the background corner radius and uses a corner radius that generates a capsule.
- **UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle.large**: A style that ignores the background corner radius and uses a large system-defined corner radius.
- **UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle.medium**: A style that ignores the background corner radius and uses a medium system-defined corner radius.
- **UIButton.Configuration.CornerStyle.small**: A style that ignores the background corner radius and uses a small system-defined corner radius.

## Configuring the button background

- **background**: The configuration to customize the button background.
- **cornerStyle**: The button style that controls the display behavior of the background corner radius.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
